tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE expenses (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE expenses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE OtherExpenses (
    expense_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);
